features: SILVER FINISH will compliment any kitchen.Filter type:Paper
BREW A CUP AND A CARAFE: Use both ground coffee and K-Cup pods.
STRONG BREW: Brew a stronger, more intense single cup.
MULTIPLE BREW SIZES: Brew a 6, 8, 10, or 12-cup carafe and a 6, 8, 10, or 12 oz. cup.

LARGE 60 oz. WATER RESERVOIR: The 60 oz. water reservoir is shared between the single serve and carafe brewing, saving you time and simplifying your morning routine. Removable reservoir makes refilling easy.
12-CUP GLASS CARAFE: with metallic handle and heating plate included to keep your coffee hot.
PROGRAMMABLE CARAFE AUTO-BREW: Program your coffee maker to automatically brew a carafe up to 24 hours in advance.
PAUSE & POUR: Automatically pauses your coffee maker mid-brew for 20 seconds, allowing the carafe to be poured.
SMART START: Your coffee maker heats, then brews in one simple process. No need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
body.description: The K-Duo® Special Edition Single Serve & Carafe Coffee Maker: the perfect brewer for any occasion. This versatile brewer is the best of both worlds, using both K-Cup® pods and ground coffee to brew a cup and a carafe of your favorite varieties. The K-Duo® Special Edition coffee maker has sleek, silver finish that will compliment any kitchen and stand out on your countertop. The 60 oz. single water reservoir is shared between single serve and carafe brewing, which means fewer water refills to save you time. The included 12-cup glass carafe with metallic handle and heating plate are perfect for keeping your coffee hot, and the added convenience of the Pause & Pour feature makes serving a snap! No need to wait for the entire carafe to brew – the Keurig® K-Duo® Special Edition coffee maker can be paused mid-brew for 20 seconds, so you can pour fresh, hot coffee right away. Or set your preferred brew time up to 24 hours in advance and enjoy a freshly brewed carafe right when you want it with Programmable Carafe Auto Brew. Create your perfect cup and carafe every time with the K-Duo® Special Edition coffee maker. Choose your favorite ground coffee, or choose from hundreds of delicious K-Cup® pod varieties of coffee, tea, cocoa, and more. Use the Strong Brew button for a bolder, more intense single cup. With multiple brew sizes, you can make a 6, 8, 10, or 12-cup carafe for large gatherings, as well as a 6, 8, 10, or 12 oz. cup just for you. You can brew the perfect amount of fresh, full-flavored coffee whether you’re hosting friends or just enjoying a cup – and a moment – to yourself! Based on consumer feedback, we have updated the K-Duo Brewer. Customer reviews have been removed that relate to the previous version of the brewer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keurig dual coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Love it. Easy to work. Coffee is very hot. Did order Keurig refillable kcup, I drink a lot of coffee and is more reasonable to us than so many kcups.So far I am really enjoying my new purchase. It's an expensive coffee maker but feel is worth the price. Also no leaks from coffee pot, made very well. Diffenently given it a 5.When you get before use follow the set up instructions.all will go easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved my old small Keurig that I'd had for years but wanted to upgrade to be able to also brew a pot on occasion. This Keurig with both single cup and brewing is so perfect, I wish I'd gotten it sooner! It's got the space saving style but convenience of a two in one product and preforms perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is awesome works great!
reviews.reviewText: Love this coffee maker works well use it every morning!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The pot dumps coffee all over
reviews.reviewText: Poorly designed coffee pot it dribbled coffee all over every time I pour a cup other than that it’s amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Big benefit is that you get two coffee makers in one. A drip and k cup maker. Removed two from the counter and replaced with one. She’s space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I returned it. Too Many design flaws.
reviews.reviewText: There were a few deal breakers about this coffee maker that ultimately led to me returning it. The first being that the carafe is poorly made; nearly every time I or my fiance poured a cup of coffee we would end up with a pool from the carafe on the counter...didn't matter how steep or shallow of the pour, a pool would form, the leak is coming from the gap between the flip-top lid and the ring around the lid so there is no way to stop it from leaking....simply a poor design.The next reason i returned it is because of it's functionality with the autobrew. When setting autobrew, you need to turn on the coffee maker to enable the autobrew function, ramping up the coffee maker as if i you are going to actually make coffee at that time. So essentially you are running the coffee maker twice and using twice as much electricity as you would need to be due to the rapid heating of the water.Customer support was unhelpful from Keurig, They seemed to struggle to understand when i called regarding the carafe issue. Also, they did not call me back after the department they were going to transfer me too that day was unavailable, so i had to call back a second time. Eventually when i got someone who sort of understood the issue, They did want to send me a new carafe, but i tried to help them understand that it is a design flaw, not an individual product defect...they didn't have an alternate carafe they could send me ( a better made one). This led to me returning the coffee maker. It did make pretty good coffee if you can get passed the increased expense in electricity and paper towel usage on top of an already expensive coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely the best coffee pot Kueric has made so far. I've had 4 now with no problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dual use
reviews.reviewText: I love this coffee maker. Perfect for multi purpose and coffee types (ground coffee or k-cups). The only thing I don’t like is it needs water more frequently and it is placed in the back vs. the side making it more difficult to place when refilled.

Love the compact size. I like that I don’t have to remove the coffee pot to use the single cups/pods. I use it mostly for hot water for tea or hot chocolate. It heats up very quickly. Nice when company comes I can make a pot of coffee without having to drag out another coffee maker. It’s very attractive looking. I got the reusable coffee basket also.
Excelente producto! Solo se puede usar con K-Pods

Honestly I hesitated buying this model due to all the backlash and criticism it received. But I took a leap of faith and put my trust into the few good reviews and I’m so glad I did! Zero issues. None. The pot brew function works well, as does the single brew. The people complaining about the grounds overflowing must be using an extra fine grind of coffee or something cause I’ve never had that problem. Try a fine-medium grind people. And those complaining about the coffee pot really have me wondering if they’ve ever poured a pot of coffee before. Everything works as it should. Period. The end.Looks quite elegant, it’s quiet and most importantly, super convenient. Cheers.
We had to replace our other one and this makes great coffee.

reviews.reviewTitle: Decanter drips everywhere but your cup
reviews.reviewText: While the equipment is easy to use, the decanter is terrible designed and drips coffee everywhere but your cup. Coffee taste isn’t the better but ok to wake you up in the morning. Coffee will only stay warm for 2h else the machine turns off automatically.
